attributes.review: My name is Yoshikage Kira. I'm 33 years old. My house is in the northeast section of Morioh, where all the villas are, and I am not married. I work as an employee for the Kame Yu department stores, and I get home every day by 8 PM at the latest. I don't smoke, but I occasionally drink. I'm in bed by 11 PM, and make sure I get eight hours of sleep, no matter what. After having a glass of warm milk and doing about twenty minutes of stretches before going to bed, I usually have no problems sleeping until morning. Just like a baby, I wake up without any fatigue or stress in the morning. I was told there were no issues at my last check-up. I'm trying to explain that I'm a person who wishes to live a very quiet life. I take care not to trouble myself with any enemies, like winning and losing, that would cause me to lose sleep at night. That is how I deal with society, and I know that is what brings me happiness. Although, if I were to fight I wouldn't lose to anyone
attributes.title: T E R R I B L E  A P P

attributes.review: so i downloaded this app yesterday and as soon as it finished downloading all of my other apps stopped working! i thought it was a problem with my phone, but when i turned off my phone and turned it back on thinking that would fix it i noticed that ALL OF THE OTHER APPS ON MY PHONE THAT I HAD DOWNLOADED HAD BEEN DELETED EXCEPT THIS ONE. i thought that was strange so i went to ask my friend what she thought had happened and both of our phones stopped working! then siri began say extremely sexist and racist things(quoting trump) on both of our phones. it was like the app had taken over. i then got a call from my mom (which was very glitchy, by the way) telling me that all of the electronics in our house were not working and the tv would only play trump programs and fox news! then i realized that i hate trump and he is a terrible person and i never should have downloaded the app and i will not be voting for him in november.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE DO NOT GET

attributes.review: I would like to start off with the fact that this app has the audacity to greet me with an atrocious image of an orange; also known as an excuse of a president. Who let this fruit run our country, let alone an app? Secondly, just being greeted by this orange... or cheeto?? made me physically smell a musty and putrid odour through the screen. Can you believe it?!? Horrendous! I have seen enough when this THINGâ€™S naked photo was leaked on twitter. Seeing this musty crusty image makes me want to shove something in my head to erase the memory of even seeing it. This app triggered my flight or flight response, and nearly gave me a PRTS if that horrific event. This app needs to be deleted ASAP! No excuses! This cheeto even has the nerve to raise his fist on the app pretending to support the BLM movement, knowing well that weâ€™ve all seen him and his pigs throwing tear gas and macing everyone for his pathetic photoshoot with a bible! I demand this app to be deleted. Hopefully the president will be deleted soon too!!
